name: Gumdrops (Mike Milewski)
description:
Tap on a rainbow of sugar-coated candy that constantly drops from above. Hit the specific color while pacing through the clock to accumulate passed the score goal. Receive bonus points for popping the gumdrops in perfect succession, but be aware of losing points continuously for each wrong gumdrop bothered.

Grab strong powerups that periodically show up to help you reach your mark by either doubling the score of the gumdrops, slowing them all down while also freezing time, or by changing each falling gumdrop into the same color.

With each score milestone, the gumdrops will get faster, the timer will shorten, and the target gumdrop color switches more quickly.
